abstract: After a year of no progress, there are signs that the United States and China are moving toward cooperation on inspection of auditing firms.
snippet: After a year of no progress, there are signs that the United States and China are moving toward cooperation on inspection of auditing firms.
lead_paragraph: Is progress about to be made on cooperation between the United States and China on the inspection of auditing firms?

headline.main: China and the Integrity of Accounting
